globalAttributes.name: hx-get
globalAttributes.description: Issues a GET request to the specified URL

globalAttributes.name: hx-post
globalAttributes.description: Issues a POST request to the specified URL

globalAttributes.name: hx-trigger
globalAttributes.description: Specifies the event that triggers the request

globalAttributes.name: hx-target
globalAttributes.description: Specifies the target element to be updated

globalAttributes.name: hx-swap
globalAttributes.description: Specifies how the response will be swapped in
